execution_plan.description: Compute the number of orders per customer (including only customers who have placed orders) from the Orders table.
execution_plan.query: SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS orders_count FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve all customers with their gender, email address, city, and county from the users database (includes customers who have zero orders).
execution_plan.query: SELECT customer_id, gender_code, email_address, town_city, county FROM customers;
